availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: A,. H. Herod (Campbell County, Kentucky, laborer and jailer.)

body.p: Campbell County, Kentucky, laborer and jailer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Ann Reynolds Herod in Campbell County on April 30, 1840. Father of Elizabeth Herod, Mary Herod, George Herod, Alladelpha Herod, Susan Herod, Louisa Herod, and Andrew Herod. Laborer in Campbell County, Kentucky in 1850. Jailer in Campbell County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, p. 219B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, p. 587.
Campbell County marriage records.
